name: 沈立得
objective:
1. 程式語言類別
2. 物件導向與資料抽象化
3. 類別與方法
4. 訊息，實例與初始化
5. 繼承
6. 靜態與動態繫結
7. 多型性
8. 發展環境及工具
9. 物件導向程式語言C++簡介
10.應用實例
schedule:
1. Introduction to Visual C++ Programming (1 week)
2. Introduction to C language                         (2 week)
3. C++ as a better C                                        (1 week)
4. Introduction to Classes and Objects            (2 week)
5. Functions and member variable                  (2 week)
期中考
6. Arrays and Vectors                               (2 week)
7. Overloading                                          (2 week)
8. Inheritance                                            (2 week)
9. Polymorphism (dynamic binding)        (1 week)  
10. Virtual function                                   (1 week) 
11. Templates and Generics                      (2 week)
期末考
scorePolicy:
1.出席上課15%   
2.平時作業25% 
3.期中考 30%
4.期末考 30%
materials:
Paul Anderson and Gail Anderson. Navigating C++ and Object-Oriented Design. Prentice Hall.
Margaret A. Ellis and Bjarne Stroustrup. The Annotated C++ Reference Manual Addison-Wesley. 
Bjarne Stroustrup. The C++ Programming Language (3rd Ed). Addison-Wesley. 
Ira Pohl. Object-Oriented Programming Using C++ (2nd Ed). Addison-Wesley.
Bruce F. Webster. Pitfalls of Object Oriented Development. Hungry Minds, Inc.
侯俊傑. 物件導向的精髓: 多型與虛擬. 松崗.
